text: you might be thinking a course on
negotiation that's not really my thing
but let me tell you negotiation isn't
just for used car lots or job
negotiations it's woven into the fabric
of our daily interactions every
conversation you have every meeting you
attend is an opportunity for a
successful negotiation my name is Maggie
Neil and I've been practicing teaching
and researching the science of
negotiation for over 40 years
this course will equip you with the
skills to navigate any negotiation with
confidence and with Integrity to use
negotiation to reach agreements Advance
your goals and strengthen your
relationships as an emerging leader you
need to Advocate not only for yourself
but also for your team and for your
projects this course will give you the
tools to do just that and we'll break
down the negotiation process so that you
can Master each part from anticipating
the behavior of others to influencing
outcomes in your favor then we'll put
these Concepts into practice through
interactive simulations negotiation is a
skill that you can Master with
dedication and practice are you ready
well then let's get started
